cards.name: Abomasnow

abilities.name: Toughness Boost
abilities.text: Your Single Strike Pokémon in play, except any Abomasnow, get +50 HP. You can't apply more than 1 Toughness Boost Ability at a time.

cards.text: The Pokémon is known to bring blizzards. A shake of its massive body is enough to cause whiteout conditions.

cards.name: Flapple

abilities.name: Apple Drop
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may put 2 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. If you placed any damage counters in this way, shuffle this Pokémon and all attached cards into your deck.

cards.text: It ate a sour apple, and that induced its evolution. In its cheeks, it stores an acid capable of causing chemical burns.

attacks.name: Acid Spray
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

cards.name: Kingdra

abilities.name: Deep Sea King
abilities.text: When your Active Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, you may move any amount of Water Energy from that Pokémon to this Pokémon.

cards.text: It stores energy by sleeping at underwater depths at which no other life forms can survive.

attacks.name: Aqua Burst
attacks.text: This attack does 40 damage for each Water Energy attached to this Pokémon.

cards.name: Frosmoth

abilities.name: Ice Dance
abilities.text: As often as you like during your turn, you may attach a Water Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Benched Water Pokémon.

cards.text: It shows no mercy to any who desecrate fields and mountains. It will fly around on its icy wings, causing a blizzard to chase offenders away.

cards.name: Gardevoir

abilities.name: Shining Arcana
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may look at the top 2 cards of your deck and attach any number of basic Energy cards you find there to your Pokémon in any way you like. Put the other cards into your hand.

cards.text: To protect its Trainer, it will expend all its psychic power to create a small black hole.

attacks.name: Brainwave
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each Psychic Energy attached to this Pokémon.

cards.name: Wyrdeer

abilities.name: Hurried Gait
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may draw a card.

cards.text: The black orbs shine with an uncanny light when the Pokémon is erecting invisible barriers. The fur shed from its beard retains heat well and is a highly useful material for winter clothing.

attacks.name: Extrasensory
attacks.text: If you have the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent, this attack does 80 more damage.

cards.name: Falinks
cards.text: The six of them work together as one Pokémon. Teamwork is also their battle strategy, and they constantly change their formation as they fight.

attacks.name: Rapid Strike Squad
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage for each of your Rapid Strike Pokémon in play.

cards.name: Kleavor
cards.text: A violent creature that fells towering trees with its crude axes and shields itself with hard stone. If one should chance upon this Pokémon in the wilds, one's only recourse is to flee.

attacks.name: Timber Cleave
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. If both of them are heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is Knocked Out.

attacks.name: Berserker Tackle
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 30 damage to itself.

cards.name: Mightyena

abilities.name: Hustle Bark
abilities.text: If your opponent has any Pokémon VMAX in play, this Pokémon's attacks cost ColorlessColorlessColorless less.

cards.text: It chases down prey in a pack of around ten. They defeat foes with perfectly coordinated teamwork.

attacks.name: Wild Tackle
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 50 damage to itself.

cards.name: Galarian Obstagoon

abilities.name: Untamed Shout
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may put 3 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

cards.text: It evolved after experiencing numerous fights. While crossing its arms, it lets out a shout that would make any opponent flinch.

attacks.name: Obstruct
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from Basic Pokémon.

cards.name: Bronzong

abilities.name: Metal Transfer
abilities.text: As often as you like during your turn, you may move a Metal Energy from 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon.

cards.text: Many scientists suspect that this Pokémon originated outside the Galar region, based on the patterns on its body.

cards.name: Hoothoot

abilities.name: Stand Sentry
abilities.text: Basic Energy attached to your Benched Pokémon can't be discarded by an effect of your opponent's Item or Supporter cards.

cards.text: It always stands on one foot. It changes feet so fast, the movement can rarely be seen.

cards.name: Starmie V
cards.text: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Swift
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance, or by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Energy Spiral
attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage for each Energy attached to all of your opponent's Pokémon.

cards.name: Ice Rider Calyrex V
cards.text: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Glacial Lance
attacks.text: Discard 2 Energy from this Pokémon.

cards.name: Ice Rider Calyrex VMAX
cards.text: VMAX rule: When your Pokémon VMAX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Ride of the High King
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Max Lance
attacks.text: You may discard up to 2 Energy from this Pokémon. If you do, this attack does 120 more damage for each card you discarded in this way.

cards.name: Galarian Articuno V

abilities.name: Reconstitute
abilities.text: You must discard 2 cards from your hand in order to use this Ability. Once during your turn, you may draw a card.

cards.text: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Psyray
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

cards.name: Shadow Rider Calyrex V
cards.text: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Shadow Mist
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, they can't play any Special Energy or Stadium cards from their hand.

attacks.name: Astral Barrage
attacks.text: Choose 2 of your opponent's Pokémon and put 5 damage counters on each of them.

cards.name: Shadow Rider Calyrex VMAX

abilities.name: Underworld Door
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may attach a Psychic Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Benched Psychic Pokémon. If you attached Energy to a Pokémon in this way, draw 2 cards.

cards.text: VMAX rule: When your Pokémon VMAX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Max Geist
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each Psychic Energy attached to all of your Pokémon.

cards.name: Galarian Zapdos V

abilities.name: Fighting Instinct
abilities.text: This Pokémon's attacks cost Colorless less for each of your opponent's Pokémon V in play.

cards.text: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Thunderous Kick
attacks.text: Before doing damage, discard a Special Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

cards.name: Galarian Moltres V

abilities.name: Direflame Wings
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may attach a Darkness Energy card from your discard pile to this Pokémon. You can't use more than 1 Direflame Wings Ability each turn.

cards.text: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Aura Burn
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 30 damage to itself.

cards.name: Zacian V

abilities.name: Intrepid Sword
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may look at the top 3 cards of your deck and attach any number of Metal Energy cards you find there to this Pokémon. Put the other cards into your hand. If you use this Ability, your turn ends.

cards.text: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Brave Blade
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

cards.name: Zamazenta V

abilities.name: Dauntless Shield
abilities.text: Prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon VMAX.

cards.text: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Assault Tackle
attacks.text: Discard a Special Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

cards.name: Garchomp V
cards.text: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Sonic Strike
attacks.text: Discard 3 Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 220 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

cards.name: Allister
cards.text: Draw 3 cards. If you drew any cards in this way, discard up to 3 cards from your hand. (You must discard at least 1 card.),You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

cards.name: Bea
cards.text: Discard the top 5 cards of your deck, and attach any Energy cards you discarded in this way to your Benched Fighting Pokémon in any way you like.,You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

cards.name: Melony
cards.text: Attach a Water Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Pokémon V. If you do, draw 3 cards.,You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

cards.name: Milo
cards.text: Discard up to 2 cards from your hand, and draw 2 cards for each card you discarded in this way.,You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

cards.name: Piers
cards.text: Search your deck for an Energy card and a Darkness Pokémon, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.,You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

cards.name: Ice Rider Calyrex VMAX
cards.text: VMAX rule: When your Pokémon VMAX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Ride of the High King
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Max Lance
attacks.text: You may discard up to 2 Energy from this Pokémon. If you do, this attack does 120 more damage for each card you discarded in this way.

cards.name: Shadow Rider Calyrex VMAX

abilities.name: Underworld Door
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may attach a Psychic Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Benched Psychic Pokémon. If you attached Energy to a Pokémon in this way, draw 2 cards.

cards.text: VMAX rule: When your Pokémon VMAX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Max Geist
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each Psychic Energy attached to all of your Pokémon.
